word: A FEW MONTHS PRIOR TO THE APPEARANCE OF THIS TESTIMONY, ELDER WHITE HAD PUBLISHED AN EDITORIAL IN THE REVIEW AND HERALD ENTITLED "THE NATION," TO WHICH REFERENCE IS MADE ON PAGE 356.
